### Test

```{r}


a <- tibble(x = seq(0, 30, 6),
            y = 0.5*x^2)

a %>%
  ggplot() +
    geom_line(aes(x = x, y = y),
              color = "darkred") +
    theme_bw() +
    theme(panel.grid = element_line(color = "gray90"))

```
